title: Deuout contemplations expressed in two and fortie sermons vpon all ye quadragesimall Gospells written in Spanish by Fr. Ch. de Fonseca Englished by. I. M. of Magdalen Colledge in Oxford
author: Fonseca, Cristóbal de, 1550?-1621.
notes: A translation of: Fonseca, Cristóbal de.  Discursos para Qodos los Evangelios de la Quaresma.
Translator's dedication signed: Don Diego Puede-Ser, i.e. James Mabbe.
The title page is engraved and signed: T. Cecill sculp.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
